title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba season4
synopsis: In the Sunshine Forest Kindergarten, an exchange student came. His name is Dudu. Dudu is a big fan of Pigman. He likes to wear Pigman's clothes. When children encounter difficulties, the hero in their hearts changes. The school bus will be transformed into a police car, fire truck, ambulance, rescue boat, submarine, and plane. They will immediately rush to use their profound knowledge and various interesting props to defuse the crisis, protect the children’s safety, and answer their questions. In addition, he is amiable and a good teacher and helpful friend to children. He usually helps children understand their emotions and learn to deal with social problems. This film uses an innocent and childlike way to solve problems for the children, and at the same time establish a deep friendship with the children. (translated from iqiyi)
